message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $200. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $180. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $190?
I appreciate the willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $170. I'm willing to pay that price, but I'm still not sure I can go any higher than that.
Bob, I'm trying to be flexible, but $170 is just too low for me.  My final offer is $185.  Take it or leave it.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll offer $175. That's my final offer.
